resources.string: \nALBUMS ACTIVITY When an user will click AlbumsActivity all albums covers will show up. ListView will be used to display all the albums on the phone. When user will click on the cover image a new intent will open inside the album and display all the songs in that album.

\nARTISTS ACTIVITY When an user will click ArtistsActivity all artist covers on the phone will show up. ListView will be used to display all the artists on the phone. When user will click on the cover image a new intent will open all songs by that artist in new activity called ArtistsSongs.
\nNOW PLAYING ACTIVITY Now playing activity will show track cover being played now by MediaPlayer API.
\nPAYMENT ACTIVITY In payment activity when a user will click to buy button an intent will open another activity where will user will be able to pay for the song or album using Paypal API.
\n MAIN ACTIVITY Main activity will display menu of the app with the buttons to open other activities in the application.
